forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 66F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear this evening then becoming mostly cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 21C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 69F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 68F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
